feed.title: GitHub Scala Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Scala in GitHub

entry.title: rockthejvm/udemy-scala-advanced
entry.summary:
The official repository for the Advanced Scala course on Udemy

The official repository for the Scala Advanced course on Udemy

This repository contains the code we wrote during Rock the JVM's Scala Advanced course on Udemy. Unless explicitly mentioned, the code in this repository is exactly what was caught on camera.

How to install:

  • either clone the repo or download as zip
  • open with IntelliJ as it's a simple IDEA project

If you have changes to suggest to this repo, either

  • submit a GitHub issue
  • tell me in the course Q/A forum
  • submit a pull request!
